td.content: s:m aged 63 years presents with 5 weeks history of Kidney. o:Height 68 in, Weight 123 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel.

s:a 64 yo white M paramedic with C/O moderate denial of any trauma for 10 days that is frequent. patient also reports moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture, moderate recurrent chest pain. o:Height 68 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dilaudid - 0.015 mg/kg every 3 hours, and ordered Hemoglobin electrophoresis, Hand XRY.

s:patient with C/O Kidney. pt is a 65 YO male paramedic. o:Height 68 in, Weight 123 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete, FENa, Arterial Blood Gas, Blood culture.

td.content: s:65 YO m paramedic complains of mild fever x 11 days. o:Height 68 in, Weight 125 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed hydroxyurea - 15 mg/kg daily, and ordered Karyotype in CVS.
